synopsis.text:
This anime, set in the expansive and breathtaking landscape of Hokkaido, follows the intertwining lives of six young women as they navigate the complexities of love, friendship, and personal growth. The legend of diamond dust—the mesmerizing natural phenomenon where ice crystals glimmer in the frosty air, believed to promise eternal happiness to couples who witness it together—serves as a unifying thread throughout their individual journeys.

Each of the twelve episodes delves into the life of a different protagonist, revealing the pivotal decisions they must make and the ethical dilemmas they face. The series captures the essence of youth and the unique challenges that come with it, subtly highlighting the characteristics of this transformative period.

From the biting chill of winter to the invigorating warmth of summer, the anime offers a vivid portrayal of life in Hokkaido while exploring the emotional ups and downs of its charming heroines. Through their experiences, the viewers are left with a heartwarming and comforting sensation, inviting them to reflect on their own journey towards happiness.
